segments.pli: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṃ vacanāya:
segments.en: “Mendicants, when a mendicant’s mind has been well consolidated with wisdom it’s appropriate for them to say:

segments.pli: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
segments.en: ‘I understand: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.”’

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti?
segments.en: And how is a mendicant’s mind well consolidated with wisdom?

segments.pli: ‘Vītarāgaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: The mind is well consolidated with wisdom when they know: ‘My mind is without greed.’

segments.pli: ‘vītadosaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
‘vītamohaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
‘asarāgadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to become greedy.’

segments.pli: ‘asadosadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to become hateful.’

segments.pli: ‘asamohadhammaṃ me cittan’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to become deluded.’

segments.pli: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ kāmabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to return to rebirth in the sensual realm.’

segments.pli: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ rūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti;
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to return to rebirth in the realm of luminous form.’

segments.pli: ‘anāvattidhammaṃ me cittaṃ arūpabhavāyā’ti paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti.
segments.en: … ‘My mind is not liable to return to rebirth in the formless realm.’

segments.pli: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paññāya cittaṃ suparicitaṃ hoti, tassetaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallaṃ vacanāya:
segments.en: When a mendicant’s mind has been well consolidated with wisdom it’s appropriate for them to say:

segments.pli: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’”ti.
segments.en: ‘I understand: “Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.”’”
